entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't work with native AOT `IlcDisableReflection` #68093
  • NativeAOT publish regression in preview version (worked with alpha) hangs and uses 20GB+ memory #68079
  • System.Text.Json source generator crashes when processing unresolved symbols #68072
    7.0.0
  • MutualTLS authentication in C# for httpclient #68070
  • enterprise-linux pipeline should report results to test database #68067

Closed

  • Random exceptions when calling System.Type.GetInterface #67144
  • Bogus null checks in MeterListener.SetMeasurementEventCallback<T> #68025
    7.0.0
  • [7.0.100-preview.4.22212.1] File.AppendAllTextAsync/WriteAllTextAsync doesn't throw System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException #68073
    7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.sh #67603
    6.0.x
  • S.P.C PDB is being overwritten by NativeAOT PDB in folder #67851
    7.0.0
  • TLS1.3 networking tests are flaky on Windows 11 #58927
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\largefuncletframe\\largefuncletframe.cmd #68003
    7.0.0
  • [Proposal] Analyzer that suggests ToUpperInvariant/ToLowerInvariant in place of ToUpper/ToLower #43976
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.***.Abstractions nuget package/metapackage for use in class library #67637
  • dotnet/optimization builds are broken #66646
  • [API Proposal]: Add ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly() #66126
    7.0.0
  • Generating `ref` files automatically after making changes in source files #68057
  • Error in load assembly 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, Version=4.0.4.1' #68023
  • WasmTestRunner failing with assertion for generic math tests #67999
    7.0.0
  • Custom apphost fails to flush nettrace file on shutdown #67877
    7.0.0
  • Run a .NET framework dll from .NET Core #68041

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix cmake RPATH CMP0068 warnings #68095
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose APIs for getting the exponent and significand for IFloatingPoint types #68094
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move test that uses the network to outerloop #68092
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] ARM64 - Changed GT_MADD to not emit 'msub' #68088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support d8 instead of dx in ApkBuilder #68084
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: fix flags lossage in morph comma/ind interchange #68082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Validate public APIs have an implementation #68080
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Correct MSVC version in requirements documentation #68078
    community-contribution
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
  • Retype pointers to 'this' on stack as unmanaged pointers #68074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable failures related to 'refPosition->RegOptional()' #68068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improving STJ source generator support for record types #68064
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix Assembly reference in unloadability #67922
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • NativeAOT build support and doc improvements #68038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support nullability in SetMeasurementEventCallback (fixes #68025) #68071
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Copy AOT PDBs to a subdirectory #68063
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • disable Tls 1.0 and 1.1 tests on new Windows #68083
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
    area-Meta
  • Fix documentation issues in recent DateTime API additions #68019
    area-System.Runtime
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • re-enable TLS 13 tests on Windows #68009
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • JIT: fix assert seen in some OSR cases #68048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SPCL to glossary. #68081
    documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix JITDUMP alignment of promoted fields #68076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix MissingMethodException on calling methods with pointer arrays on generic classes #68059
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve JsonTestHelpers.AssertJsonEqual error messages #67973
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Expose the GetShortestBitLength, GetByteCount, and WriteLittleEndian APIs #67939
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly() #68051
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono] Cleanup assembly loading #67984
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move Regex pattern description into partial method remarks #67990
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Reduce r2r-extra GC stress level to 0xC per #68060 #68062
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Handle static virtual methods correctly during IMT table const… #68058
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix tests broken on 'main' #68054
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Adding generic-math tests for decimal and double/single/half to parity the integer tests #68043
    area-System.Runtime
  • disable NTLM tests on systems with OpenSSL 3 #68039
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Fix PGO trace data collection in the presence of collectible assemblies #68001
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, PGO
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta

Updated

  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Fix pointer array marshalling #67988
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • vm: Improve getStringLiteral for dynamic context #68055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Use RegexCaseEquivalence table for case-insensitive backreferences #67977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    area-Infrastructure, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, no-recent-activity, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature/VerifySignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity
  • Use and support OpenSSL 3 on macOS #68045
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add JSON type hierarchies as a preview feature #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Group 8] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting` #67511
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Check MultiCoreJit code cache before trying to jit method in mcj thread #67579
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • hostpolicy: As a fallback, try to resolve mangled stdcall symbols on win-x86. #67813
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #68024
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Disable exception for uint type. #68022
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Add MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #67929
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #68050
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workloads: Better handling of package signature failures during install #24887
  • Error Installing dotnet-sdk on Ubuntu 18.04.6 LTS #24877
  • With .NET 6.0.105, restoring project failed on Mariner 2.0 x64 #24875

Closed

  • Unable to install SDK on Ubuntu18 successfully #24876

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update specific package versions #24871
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #24874
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24860
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Next set of three test projects to move to Helix. #23975
    Area-Infrastructure
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "utf8 string literals" #184

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CompletionProvider.GetChangeAsync needs fallback options #60786
  • Populate switch warning suggest an unreachable default case #60784
  • Introduce local option is not available in VB when the expression is in an interpolated string #60783
  • Inline temporary variable adds extra type conversions in VB #60782
  • Public CodeAction.PostProcessChangesAsync has no way to retrieve fallback options #60777
  • NRE while renaming property in Roslyn.sln #60776
  • Code Cleanup fine tuning and description #60775
  • .editorconfig changes are automatically reverted #60774
  • Verify change to ConstantValueToStringTest01 test #60767
  • Verify change to AssemblyLoading_DependencyInDifferentDirectory_Delete test #60766
  • Verify changes to ConvertOnEnum test #60765
  • Verify change to CscCompile_WithSourceCodeRedirectedViaStandardInput_ProducesLibrary #60764
  • Reenable AssemblyLoading_MultipleVersions_ExactAndGreaterMatch #60763
  • Renable TestGeneratorsCantTargetNetFramework #60762

Closed

  • Roslyn incorrectly suggests "Remove unnecessary parentheses" on tuples #43934
    Backlog
  • There is a typo in "Configure Code Cleanup" #60773
  • ServiceHub fails to share CompilationTracker instances or otherwise synchronize dependent project parsing #59218
    17.3
  • KeyNotFoundException in remote process #60750
  • False CS8620 warning with generics #60769
    17.3
  • Code editor stop working when primitive type in lambda parameter #60164
    Backlog
  • Switch optimizations aren't applied to pattern matching #58246
    Compiler.Next
  • Utf8String doesn't work with pattern matching #60747
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Update partial generic handling #60789
    Area-IDE
  • Forbid types with required members from substituting for where T : new() #60788
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify the communication between the VS client and OOP further. #60787
    Area-IDE
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Mark "nameof(parameter)" feature as complete #60771
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge "extended nameof scope" feature #60770
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge `main` into `features/nameof-parameter` #60781
    Area-Compilers
  • Bump Humanizer.Core version to 2.14.1 #60785
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fixed false positive "Remove unnecessary parentheses" on tuples when applying change result in broken code #60772
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify client/OOP asset sync more. #60779
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'features/UnsignedRightShift' into 'main' #60780
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify the constructs we use to sync changes between client and OOP. #60761
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Reenable concurrent OOP sync sharing. #60758
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add ReplacementTextChange to OmniSharpInlineHint #60768
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add parameters in scope in nameof in certain attributes #60642
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/required members #60760
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Expose new Recommender API #60686
    Area-IDE
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Suggestion after comparison operators in is pattern matching #60752
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Initial .NET Framework ARM64 support #60735
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SNI configuration doesn't allow multiple hostnames of same length #41216
  • Route handler filters don't handle all return types #41213
  • Cannot build the project which reference to another project #41210
  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeCanBeIgnoredInProcess #41207
    Test failures
  • Kestrel uses exception for control flow when handling the `"Connection": "close"` header. #41206
    .NET 7 Planning
  • No platform compatability analyzer warnings in Razor @code sections #41205
  • Asp.Net Core Web App + Background Service + Web Api In Same Project? #41204
  • Double setting of Bound Variable when using EventCallback Async Await with HttpClient call #41217
  • OnInitializedAsync runs on every page load #41200

Closed

  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #32331
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Issue reading two querystrings from HttpContext.Request.Query #41191
    Discussions
  • AddDatabaseDeveloperPageExceptionFilter is added in all environments #41164
  • Blazor Constructor Dependency Injection Stopped Working #41209
  • POST 405 (Method Not Allowed) error on Azure using Blazor, but everything works on localhost #41211
  • Re #41202
  • We #41201
  • Request Body as a string. #41145
  • Can't configure SSL certificate when TLS1.2 is enabled #41175

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41215
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update InputFile error message for stale references #41094
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview4
  • Signal IsCompleted from Response.BodyWriter after abort #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeCanBeIgnoredInProcess #41208
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Add SocketsHttpHandler logging to gRPC interop tests #41199
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add TypedResults static factory class for creating typed IResult objects #41161
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Try new docker image #41194
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #41197
    area-web-frameworks
  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Allow specifying authz policies on endpoints #41153
    area-security
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Counters "best practices" - when to use PollingCounter vs EventCounter, Incrementing vs non-Incrementing, thread safety, etc. #2909
    .NET 7.0
  • How to get the memory size of value type correctly in Windbg with SOS extension? #3009
    .NET 7.0
  • Diagnostic Port and Microsoft.Diagnostics.NetCore.Client #2900
    .NET 7.0
  • dotnet-trace prints "Unable to examine process." (when run in Kudu command line on App Service) #2781
    .NET 7.0

Updated

  • Diagnosing CPU usage with dotnet-trace and VS #2901
    .NET 7.0
  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515
    .NET 7.0
  • Soshelp does not show available switches #2999
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Set symstore HTTP retry count in all test cases #3015

Merged

  • Create clear error messages for dotnet-trace #3012
    dotnet-trace, .NET 7.0

Updated

  • [Infrastructure] Add devcontainer infra to diagnostics repo #2986
    Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sample app crashes on iOS 12 #6147
  • sqlite path null #6145
  • Android is not just Phones Feature requests #6144
  • [ANDROID] Label with FormattedText does not render properly #6141
  • Layout View Resorting is breaking Windows Narrators ability to navigate through elements #6140
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android] Grid columns not correctly calculated when control spans columns and auto column definition is used #6138
  • Crash while trying to to register sync root with the OS in Windows #6136
  • iOS Crash on populating CollectionView with data #6134
  • Crash while resizing window with grouped ListView #6132
  • Label Formattedtext setting textcolor sets backgroundcolor too #6129
  • ArcSegments are rendered as straight lines #6128
  • New Item Template for XAML ContentView creates a Resource Dictionary #6125
  • The dotnet_bot image in default mobile template is blurry #6121
  • CollectionView items not rendered when using EmptyView #6119
  • Selection Highlight offset by 5 pixels #6118

Closed

  • Remaining Todo items in Android WebKitWebViewClient #6002
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Repeatedly going to "/" in MAUI app on Android shows an info/error in the logs #5850
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Microsoft.Maui.Essentials unavailable in VS 2022 Preview 3.0 #6146
  • .NET MAUI Android target publishing/archiving #4377
  • [Blazor webview] Exception handling for blazor webview #4441
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Counter is disappearing in the default MAUI project on Android #6112
  • [Android] Crash updating FontSize using HotReload #4610
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • XAML Hot Reload is not working on Blazor MAUI apps #4474
    6.0.300
  • XAML Hot Reload not working running MAUI app on Windows Machine #3237
  • [Bug] No Android Splash screen on API 31 #3306
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Changing Detail of a FlyoutPage leads to an empty page on Android #5541
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Blazor Hybrid WinForms apps give error if there's an ErrorBoundary #4502
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView inside Android can't be reloaded #5136
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • IOS Simulators no longer work #6127
  • BlazorWebView AdditionalBrowserArguments #4586
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Windows] Frames do not size correctly #4042
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Unable to build Windows class libraries with dotnet build #5886
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Hot Restart No longer works #6123
  • iOS ATTrackingManager is missing #6126
  • SkiaSharp OnPaintSurface not called on iOS device connected to Windows dev computer #6120
  • Images not appearing on Android App with RC1 #6116
  • Windows Blue Screen when connecting to simulator #6117

PullRequests

Created

  • Create custom Automation Peer for MauiButton #6139
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Use known row/column width/height when doing initial measure #6137
    area/layout 🔲
  • Update aot profile #6133
  • Remove old maestro feeds #6131
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.2

Merged

  • Blazor Hybrid Android Prevent Repeated Blazor Instantiation #6143
    platform/android 🤖, area/blazor 🕸️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220415212451963 to loc #6142
  • Create Flyout.Details inside Fragment #6023
    area/navigation 🧭, partner/android
  • Remove Build Tasks that are now implicitly included #6130
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Include margin in Frame's DesiredSize #6114
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Static content hot reload update #6124
  • Fix WinUI class libraries a bit better #6089
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️, p/0, partner/winui, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future

Updated

  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/architecture
  • Re-enable Shell Tests #5745
    area/shell 🐢
  • Swap out virtual view when navigating to new Shell Item #6109
    area/shell 🐢
  • BlazorWebView: Allow for WPF and WinForms WebView2 Custom Startup Settings and Fixed Distribution Mode #5086
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085
    area/layout 🔲
  • [workload] Merge Dependencies and Extensions packs #5918
    area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.3xx] Add razor-compiler to Source Build #13652
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #13648
  • Remove pathcch dependency #13646

Merged

  • unset shell variables in single statement #13436
